description: Kéo thu tiền CRM từ His về chính
body:
DECLARE @HisID INT = $CURSOR$
INSERT INTO dbo.CashCollectionReceiptsNoVAT
        (
         ReceiptCode
       , ReceiptDate
       , WarehouseCode
       , CashCollectionVendorID
       , VendorCode
       , RefID
       , RefCode
       , CustomerID
       , CustomerCode
       , CustomerName
       , MobilePhoneNumber
       , Amount
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATType
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATStatus
       , Remark
       , CreatedDateTime
       , LastUpdatedDateTime
       , CreatedEmployeeBy
       , LastUpdatedEmployeeBy
       , RefInvoiceCode
       , IsConfirmed
       , ConfirmedDate
       , ConfirmedEmployeeBy
       , Notes
       , ContractNumber
        )
SELECT	ReceiptCode
       , ReceiptDate
       , WarehouseCode
       , CashCollectionVendorID
       , VendorCode
       , RefID
       , RefCode
       , CustomerID
       , CustomerCode
       , CustomerName
       , MobilePhoneNumber
       , Amount
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATType
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATStatus
       , Remark
       , CreatedDateTime
       , LastUpdatedDateTime
       , CreatedEmployeeBy
       , LastUpdatedEmployeeBy
       , RefInvoiceCode
       , IsConfirmed
       , ConfirmedDate
       , ConfirmedEmployeeBy
       , Notes
       , ContractNumber
FROM	 
	dbo.CashCollectionReceiptsNoVAT_History (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
	ID = @HisID

DELETE FROM dbo.CashCollectionReceiptsNoVAT_History WHERE ID = @HisID;
